flawed_nl_solution:
At the meeting, 200-100=<<200-100=80>>80 people decided to have a snack.
20 new people came in to snack and the area had 80+20=<<80+20=100>>100 of them eating.
100/2=<<100/2=50>>50 people got full and left.
10 more new people came to join in the snacking so 50+10=<<10+50=60>>60 people were eating.
After 30 people left, 60-30=<<60-30=30>>30 people who were eating remained.
In the end, only 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 kept eating.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
